adv_1: It helps to find not only interesting events, but also new acquaintances among the same creative people as you! Create together, learn, study and just have a good time.
adv_2: We collect events and places from all over the Internet in one place. Then we sort, categorize, filter and moderate so that you only have to choose the best!
adv_3: We contact the organizers and landlords, save your tickets in a convenient system and help you not get lost on the spot. We are with you all the way and will help you contact the administrators if there are difficulties!
adv_4: We understand that it is not easy for the organizers. But we can make your task much EASIER: a user-friendly and intuitive interface, a verified notification system and, of course, statistics collection.
